org.knime.core.internal

Class CorePlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.knime.core.internal.CorePlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator

    public class CorePlugin
extends Object
implements org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator
    Plugin class that is initialized when the plugin project is started. It will set the workspace path as KNIME home dir in the KNIMEConstants utility class.
    Author:
    wiswedel, University of Konstanz

    • Method Detail

      • setWrapColumnHeaderInTableViews

        public final void setWrapColumnHeaderInTableViews(boolean value)
        A property controlled by the UI preference page. We need a field in the core plugin as it does not access to any UI plugin. We rely on the UI plugin to init/update this field.
        Parameters:
        value - the isWrapColumnHeaderInTableViews to set
        Since:
        2.8
        No public API: not to be referenced by clients
        This method is not intended to be referenced by clients.

        Returns:
        the isWrapColumnHeaderInTableViews
        Since:
        2.8
        No public API: not to be referenced by clients
        This method is not intended to be referenced by clients.

      • resolveURItoLocalFile

        @Deprecated
public static File resolveURItoLocalFile(URI uri)
                                              throws IOException
        Deprecated. Use ResolverUtil.resolveURItoLocalFile(URI) instead
        Fetches a service implementing the URIToFileResolve interface and returns the resolved file.
        Parameters:
        uri - The URI to resolve
        Returns:
        The local file underlying the URI (if any)
        Throws:
        IOException - If no service is registered or the URI can't be resolved.

      • resolveURItoLocalOrTempFile

        @Deprecated
public static File resolveURItoLocalOrTempFile(URI uri)
                                                    throws IOException
        Deprecated. Use ResolverUtil.resolveURItoLocalOrTempFile(URI) instead
        Fetches a service implementing the URIToFileResolve interface and returns the resolved file.
        Parameters:
        uri - The URI to resolve
        Returns:
        The local file or temporary copy of a remote file underlying the URI (if any)
        Throws:
        IOException - If no service is registered or the URI can't be resolved.
